name: Soulless

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally DEF in Faction Crypts by 44%

skills.name: Bewildering Blow
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 35% chance of placing a [Stun] debuff for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Level 2 Damage +5%
Level 3 Damage +5%
Level 4 Damage +10%
Level 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Wave of Despair
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Each hit has a 75% chance to remove a buff. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn if a buff is removed.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Level 2 Damage +10%
Level 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Level 4 Damage +10%
Level 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.name: Reign of Terror
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies. Places a [Provoke] debuff for 1 turn. Increases the duration of all debuffs on the target by 1 turn. Places a [Shield] buff on this Champion for 2 turns equal to 30% of damage dealt. The damage increases by 10% per each debuff on the target.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Level 2 Damage +10%
Level 3 Shield +10%
Level 4 Shield +10%
Level 5 Cooldown -1

faction.name: Knight Revenant
faction.default_description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 36 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Knight Revenant is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 22 champions. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

faction.raw_description: Disciples of the K'leth death cult, the Knights Revenant see themselves as vessels of the spirits of the dead of their order. They raid indiscriminately to capture slaves to support themselves and as ritual sacrifices. Upon initiation, devotees surrender their bodies to the spirits of dark warriors.

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Soulless is a legendary def champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Knight Revenant, Soulless is a champion of Legendary rarity and of Def type
structured_data.name: Soulless

default_description: Soulless is a legendary def champion from the faction Knight Revenant doing void damage
lore: The Soulless was a mortal King of Luzand, the city where the Kleth death cult is said to have been founded thousands of years ago. Desiring to rule Luzand indefinitely, he locked his soul to the Shield of Despair  the Luzandian symbol of royal power. At that moment the cursed city of Luzand and all its people were swallowed by the sand, leaving only their King alive. The Soulless wanders still, with no soul but his shield, reigning over none but his forsaken self
